results.title: LDL-cholesterol lowering and clinical outcomes in hypercholesterolemic subjects with and without a familial hypercholesterolemia phenotype: Analysis from the secondary prevention 4S trial.
results.text_hl: METHODS: The 4S trial randomized @<m>DISEASE_Hyperlipoproteinemia_Type_II</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006938 @@@hypercholesterolemic@@@ @DISEASE_Coronary_Artery_Disease @DISEASE_MESH:D003324 @@@CAD@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ to @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ or placebo.

results.title: Carotid Artery Temperature Reduction with Statin Therapy in Patients with Familial Hyperlipidemia Syndromes
results.text_hl: Among hyperlipidemic @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@, 40 (19 @<m>DISEASE_Hyperlipoproteinemia_Type_II</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006938 @@@heFH@@@ and 21 @DISEASE_Hyperlipidemia_Familial_Combined @DISEASE_MESH:D006950 @@@FCH@@@) were assigned to @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ therapy, 41 (31 @<m>DISEASE_Hyperlipoproteinemia_Type_II</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006938 @@@heFH@@@ and 10 @DISEASE_Hyperlipidemia_Familial_Combined @DISEASE_MESH:D006950 @@@FCH@@@) to @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ + @CHEMICAL_Ezetimibe @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069438 @@@ezetimibe@@@ therapy, and 34 refused statin therapy.

results.title: Carob Extract (Ceratonia siliqua L.): Effects on Dyslipidemia and Obesity in a High-Fat Diet-Fed Rat Model
results.text_hl: The same was true for water intake, but water intake was also higher in the @<m>DISEASE_Hyperlipoproteinemia_Type_II</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006938 @@@hypercholesterolemic@@@ group treated with saline and in the @<m>DISEASE_Hyperlipoproteinemia_Type_II</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006938 @@@hypercholesterolemic@@@ groups treated with @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ or @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@/@CHEMICAL_locust_bean_gum @CHEMICAL_MESH:C017471 @@@carob@@@ combined, in contrast to the @<m>DISEASE_Hyperlipoproteinemia_Type_II</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006938 @@@hypercholesterolemic@@@ group treated with @CHEMICAL_locust_bean_gum @CHEMICAL_MESH:C017471 @@@carob@@@ (p < 0.05).

results.title: Simvastatin improves mitochondrial respiration in peripheral blood cells
results.text_hl: Here, we provide evidence that long-term treatment of @<m>DISEASE_Hyperlipoproteinemia_Type_II</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006938 @@@hypercholesterolemic@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ at a therapeutic dose significantly display increased mitochondrial respiration in peripheral blood mononuclear cells (PBMCs), and platelets compared to untreated controls.

citations.NLM: Durhuus JA, Hansson S, Morville T, Kuhlman AB, Dohlmann TL, Larsen S, Helge JW, Angleys M, Muniesa-Vargas A, Bundgaard JR, Hickson ID, Dela F, Desler C, Rasmussen LJ. Simvastatin improves mitochondrial respiration in peripheral blood cells Sci Rep. 2020 Oct 12;10(1):17012. PMID: 33046789

results.title: A case with familial hypercholesterolemia complicated with severe systemic atherosclerosis intensively treated for more than 30 years.
results.text_hl: She was diagnosed with heterozygous @<m>DISEASE_Hyperlipoproteinemia_Type_II</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006938 @@@FH@@@, and started to be treated with @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ 10 mg.

results.title: High cholesterol diet promotes dysfunction of arginase and cholinergic enzymatic system in rats: ameliorative role of caffeic and chlorogenic acids.
results.text_hl: Nevertheless, treatment with @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@, @CHEMICAL_caffeic_acid @CHEMICAL_MESH:C040048 @@@CFA@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Chlorogenic_Acid @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002726 @@@CGA@@@ normalized altered @GENE_ACHE @GENE_83817 @@@AChE@@@, @GENE_BCHE @GENE_65036 @@@BChE@@@ and arginase activities as well as improved antioxidant status in @<m>DISEASE_Hyperlipoproteinemia_Type_II</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006938 @@@hypercholesterolemic@@@ @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@.

results.title: Association of cytochromes P450 3A4*22 and 3A5*3 genotypes and polymorphism with response to simvastatin in hypercholesterolemia patients
results.text_hl: Two hundred and seventy-four subjects were enrolled in this study and divided into two groups, either control subjects (126) (non-statin users) or @<m>DISEASE_Hyperlipoproteinemia_Type_II</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006938 @@@hypercholesterolemic@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ (148) taking @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ (@<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Zocor@@@  20mg) and followed up at KAUH.

citations.NLM: Elalem EG, Jelani M, Khedr A, Ahmad A, Alaama TY, Alaama MN, Al-Kreathy HM, Damanhouri ZA. Association of cytochromes P450 3A4*22 and 3A5*3 genotypes and polymorphism with response to simvastatin in hypercholesterolemia patients PLoS One. 2022;17(7):e0260824. PMID: 35839255

results.title: Brazilian green propolis extracts modulate cholesterol homeostasis in a preclinical guinea pig model: an in vitro and in vivo study.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Propolis @CHEMICAL_MESH:D011429 @@@propolis@@@ hydroalcoholic extracts promoted a significant increase in HDL @CHEMICAL_Cholesterol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002784 @@@cholesterol@@@, suggesting that these extracts can improve the serum @CHEMICAL_Lipids @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008055 @@@lipid@@@ profile of @<m>DISEASE_Hyperlipoproteinemia_Type_II</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006938 @@@hypercholesterolemic@@@ @SPECIES_10141 @@@guinea pigs@@@.
